Info: Embark on a classic adventure with Mario in 'Super Mario Bros.' Run, jump, and stomp your way through the Mushroom Kingdom to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser. With its iconic levels and timeless gameplay, it's a must-play for fans of platforming games.

Join Mario and friends in 'Super Mario Bros. 2' on a quest to save Subcon from the evil tyrant Wart. Play as Mario, Luigi, Toad, or Princess Toadstool, each with unique abilities, and conquer diverse levels filled with enemies and secrets. With its distinct gameplay mechanics, it's a standout title in the Mario series.

Embark on an epic journey with Mario in 'Super Mario Bros. 3.' Travel through eight distinct worlds, each filled with unique challenges and enemies, as you strive to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser. With its innovative power-ups and memorable levels, it's considered one of the greatest platformers of all time.

Explore Dinosaur Land with Mario in 'Super Mario World.' Journey through colorful levels, defeat Bowser's minions, and rescue Princess Peach. With its introduction of Yoshi and inventive level design, it's a beloved classic in the Super Mario series.

Embark on a cosmic journey with Mario in 'Super Mario Galaxy.' Traverse imaginative worlds, defy gravity, and collect Power Stars to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser. With charming visuals and innovative gameplay, it's an unforgettable adventure for players of all ages.

Team up with friends in 'New Super Mario Bros. Wii' and journey through the Mushroom Kingdom together. Play as Mario, Luigi, Blue Toad, or Yellow Toad as you navigate challenging levels, collect power-ups, and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches. With its multiplayer mode and classic platforming action, it's fun for players of all ages.

Embark on a cosmic journey with Mario in 'Super Mario Galaxy 2.' Traverse imaginative galaxies, defy gravity, and collect Power Stars to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser once again. With its charming visuals and innovative gameplay mechanics, it offers an unforgettable adventure for players of all ages.

Embark on a globe-trotting adventure with Mario in 'Super Mario Odyssey.' Explore vast, imaginative worlds, capture iconic enemies with your sentient hat, and rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's wedding plans. With its open-ended gameplay and stunning visuals, it's a modern masterpiece in the Super Mario series.

Join Mario, Luigi, Peach, and Toad in 'Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury' as they embark on a quest to save the Sprixie Kingdom from Bowser's clutches. Team up with friends in multiplayer mode, explore vibrant 3D environments, and face off against colossal foes. With its blend of classic platforming and exciting new features, it's a must-have for Mario fans.

Mario and friends, alongside Prince Florian, must stop Bowser from wreaking havoc by merging with the Wonder Flower. Journeying through Pipe-Rock Plateau, Fluff-Puff Peaks, and other vibrant locales, they collect Royal Seeds to disable Bowser's defenses and defeat him in Castle Bowser. With teamwork and determination, they save the Flower Kingdom and its inhabitants, the Poplins, from Bowser's clutches.
